text: you can define a function like this. it is not complete,  but I think it might help you

elements.text: you can define a function like this. it is not complete,  but I think it might help you

text:
`def split_date(df):`
    `df['Date'] =   <http://pd.to|pd.to>_datetime(df['Date'])`
    `df['Year'] = df.Date.dt.year`
    `df['Month'] = df.Date.dt.month`
    `df['Day'] = df.Date.dt.day`
    `df['WeekOfYear'] = df.Date.dt.isocalendar().week`
    `df["Day of Week"] = df.Date.dt.dayofweek`
    `df["Is Weekend"] = df.Date.dt.dayofweek > 4`
use also pandas  `pandas.Series.dt.is_month_end or is _month start`

text: I faced this same error sometime when I switched from Linux to windows, maybe that was causal or maybe it was not. Anyways what I did was instead of trying to figure out what happened and why I just pulled my latest commit from GitHub and added simply continued doing the task. Lucky for me I did not do much after my last commit, also I commit a lot, in order to solve these kinds of problems in the future. I learnt this the hard way, frequent commits are really underrated!

text:
Hello <!channel>
 How are you doing? I missed you, the tutor and the challenge today. I
was flying from Bahir Dar to Addis Ababa then to Bahir Dar today. There
was a critical lab to be done in 4 hours of interval in Addis to be
turned back to Bahir Dar Tibebe Giyon Specialized hospital. Even if it
was so much terrible, I was happy to achieve bringing lab results to my
sister's doctors at Bahir Dar. I am still trying my best to be with you
all buddies:broken_heart:.

elements.text:

was flying from Bahir Dar to Addis Ababa then to Bahir Dar today. There
was a critical lab to be done in 4 hours of interval in Addis to be
turned back to Bahir Dar Tibebe Giyon Specialized hospital. Even if it
was so much terrible, I was happy to achieve bringing lab results to my

all buddies
